definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: Yang is still looking for a book publisher.
sentences.chinese: 目前，杨雅晴仍在寻找书的出版商。

sentences.english: Carmack said Id turned down many offers from large publishers over the years.
sentences.chinese: 卡马克说号拒绝了许多优惠大出版商多年来。

sentences.english: The storefront will aim to simplify the process, in order to attract publishers.
sentences.chinese: 这个商店将努力使得流程简化以吸引出版商参与。

sentences.english: For example, books have authors and publishers.
sentences.chinese: 例如，书籍都有作者和出版商。

sentences.english: Today, many publishers are tossing around ideas about charging for their online content.
sentences.chinese: 如今，很多出版商嚷着要对他们的在线新闻收费。

sentences.english: Publishers in Paris and New York had secretly received the manuscript on microfilm.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎和纽约的出版商秘密接收了收稿的影印胶卷。

sentences.english: Can Delete or edite a Advertiser Ad.
sentences.chinese: 管理员可以查看广告商和出版商。

sentences.english: Newspaper and magazine publishers as well as videogame makers should follow.
sentences.chinese: 报纸和杂志出版商以及视频游戏生产商将会跟进。

sentences.english: The publisher has brought out the latest Chinese version of Pride and Prejudice.
sentences.chinese: 出版商出版了最新的《傲慢与偏见》中译本。

sentences.english: It gets a really nice reception at a very good publisher.
sentences.chinese: 受到颇有名气的出版商的青睐。

sentences.english: It is the trade body for contract publishers.
sentences.chinese: 该协会的会员是一些合约出版商。

sentences.english: It is unclear whether this move will affect terms negotiations with publishers.
sentences.chinese: 目前还不清楚这是否会影响并改变出版商的决策。

sentences.english: It was not dropped by the publisher.
sentences.chinese: 它没有被出版商丢到一边。

sentences.english: In both cases, the remainder would go to the book's publishers.
sentences.chinese: 在这两种情况下，其余的份额将归于图书的出版商。

sentences.english: The publisher did not reveal Du Daozheng's whereabouts.
sentences.chinese: 出版商没有透露杜导正的下落。

sentences.english: The publisher complied, but sent all its unexpurgated copies abroad.
sentences.chinese: 出版商屈从了，但同时也把未删节的副本送到了国外。

definition: printing plate/printed version (of a digital publication)/printing (as in "1st printing" etc)
